title: My uses
description: My tech and gear that I use on the daily basis

body.raw:
## Computer

- **RAM:** Crucial Ballistix 32 GB @ 4000Mhz
- **CPU:** AMD Ryzen 7 3800X 8 Core @ 4.3GHz
- **GPU:** GTX 1070
- **Motherboard:** MSI B550 Tomahawk
- **OS:** Windows + WSL (Ubuntu)

## Coding

- **Editor:** [Visual Studio Code](https://code.visualstudio.com) [(Theme, settings and extensions)](https://github.com/Dev-CasperTheGhost/dotfiles)
- **Terminal:** [Windows Terminal](https://github.com/microsoft/terminal)
- **Browser:** [Brave](https://brave.com/)
- **Environment:** [WSL2 (Ubuntu)](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/wsl/install) + Windows 11 and macOS

## Gear

- **Keyboard:** [Logitech MX Mechanical Mini](https://www.logitech.com/en-us/products/keyboards/mx-mechanical.html)
- **Mouse:** [Logitech MX Master 3S](https://www.logitech.com/en-us/products/mice/mx-master-3s.910-006556.html)
- **Monitor:** [Samsung UE590 4K 28" x2](https://www.samsung.com/us/computing/monitors/uhd-and-wqhd/samsung-uhd-28-monitor-with-high-glossy-black-finish-lu28e590ds-za/)
- **Speakers:** [Logitech Z333](https://www.logitech.com/en-us/products/speakers/z333-speaker-system-subwoofer.980-001203.html?crid=47)
- **Headset:** [AirPods 3rd generation](https://www.apple.com/airpods-3rd-generation/)

## Hosting/Cloud

- [Cloudflare](https://cloudflare.com) (DNS, Pages, Workers)
- [RONIN](https://ronin.co) (Data at the edge)
- [Vercel](https://vercel.com)
- [StackBlitz](https://stackblitz.com) (online IDE for testing and quick code scratching)
- [PlanetScale](https://planetscale.com), online MySQL database
- [Supabase](https://supabase.com), cloud PostgreSQL database & more

## Domains

<details>
    <summary>Click me to view all the (sub)domains I own.</summary>

- [caspertheghost.me](https://caspertheghost.me)
- [www.caspertheghost.me](https://www.caspertheghost.me)
- [snailycad.org](https://snailycad.org)
- [ghostybot.caspertheghost.me](https://ghostybot.caspertheghost.me)
- [tab.caspertheghost.me](https://tab.caspertheghost.me)
- [qmusic.caspertheghost.me](https://qmusic.caspertheghost.me)
- [flag-guesser.caspertheghost.me](https://flag-guesser.caspertheghost.me)
- [js-quiz.caspertheghost.me](https://js-quiz.caspertheghost.me)
- [weather-api.caspertheghost.me](https://weather-api.caspertheghost.me)
- [preview.caspertheghost.me](https://preview.caspertheghost.me)
- [cad-docs.caspertheghost.me](https://cad-docs.caspertheghost.me)
- [stats.caspertheghost.me](https://stats.caspertheghost.me)
- [terminal.caspertheghost.me](https://terminal.caspertheghost.me)
- [tic-tac-toe.caspertheghost.me](https://tic-tac-toe.caspertheghost.me)
- [earnings.caspertheghost.me](https://earnings.caspertheghost.me)
- [inventory.caspertheghost.me](https://inventory.caspertheghost.me)

</details>

## More

See something that isn't listed? [Feel free to contact me!](/#contact)
